title: Dana White discusses the UFC in 2021, Conor McGregor, Nate Diaz & more [FULL INTERVIEW] | ESPN MMA
author: ESPN MMA
description:
UFC president Dana White sits down with ESPN MMA’s Brett Okamoto to reflect on the promotion’s past 12 months as well as to look ahead to 2022.

0:00 UFC’s success in 2021.
1:30 Going through the pandemic was crucial to growth.
6:30 Goals for 2022 and beyond.
10:55 Reaction to Amanda Nunes’ loss to Julianna Pena.
11:54 Conor McGregor is “chomping at the bit” to return.
15:05 Outlook for Jon Jones in 2022.
17:00 Nate Diaz’s future in the UFC.
19:34 Thoughts on Nick Diaz’s return at UFC 266.
21:00 Francis Ngannou’s contract situation heading into UFC 270.
24:46 Khabib Nurmagomedov’s future with Eagle FC.
25:50 Landscape for upcoming title fights.
27:22 Pena vs. Nunes will be the biggest women’s fight of all time.

#UFC #MMA #DanaWhite
